title: D1: Markdown sanitize pipeline
body: Implement bluemonday policy; store content_raw and content_sanitized. Add tests.

title: D2: upsertDescription + versioning
body: Mutation to add a new version with changeNote; per-language; returns latest version.

title: D3: Description history & fallback
body: Query version list; implement language fallback on read; lightweight diff text.

title: C1: Comments schema + CRUD
body: Create Comment entity; add/add/edit/delete mutations; soft delete and edited_at.

title: C2: Comment rate limits
body: Add per-user/IP limits and cooldowns; cap links; integrate with middleware.

title: R1: Game like
body: Unique (user, game) like; aggregate count on Game; mutation rateGame(like).

title: R2: File like/dislike
body: Unique (user, file) reaction; values -1/+1; aggregate score on File; mutation reactToFile.

title: F1: Favorites
body: Favorite/unfavorite a game; unique (user, game); expose counts.

title: F2: Collections CRUD
body: Create/update/delete collections; add/remove items; ordered by position; public listing.

title: V1: Video links
body: Add YouTube/Vimeo/PeerTube links; parse/normalize provider + id; embed on game page.

title: S1: Postgres FTS index
body: Add tsvector + GIN on Game.title (and aliases if present); prepare search function.

title: S2: Search API + filters
body: search(query, platform?, yearFrom?, yearTo?, format?) â†’ GameConnection; sorting options.

title: S3: FTS suggestions
body: Prefix suggestions from FTS for opensearch + typeahead.

title: M1: Report submission
body: Client + mutation to report games/files/comments; store Report entries.

title: M2: Moderation dashboard
body: Moderator queue UI and actions: quarantine file, hide comment, revert description, remove video link; audit log.

title: SEO1: Canonical & JSON-LD
body: Add canonical URLs and JSON-LD (BreadcrumbList + CreativeWork) to game pages; OG/Twitter tags.

title: FLAGS: Feature flags
body: Gate features via SiteSetting: descriptions/comments/collections/video/search. Enable progressively.

title: QA1: Sanitize tests
body: Golden tests for markdown sanitize pipeline; ensure no unsafe HTML rendered.

title: QA2: Search tests
body: FTS fixtures; verify filters and sort; latency budget <150ms on small dataset.

title: FE: Game page UGC
body: Relay-driven description editor/history, comments, likes, file reactions, video embeds.

title: FE: Collections pages
body: My collections (CRUD) + public collection page with cover mosaic.

title: FE: Search page
body: Query + filters + infinite list; show counts.

title: FE: Moderation route
body: Role-gated route rendering moderation queue + actions.
